pullRequest.title: KOGITO-840: [DMN Designer] Move support for client-side marshalling tests to new root module
pullRequest.bodyText:
See https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-840
This PR simply moves test support from an integration module (invoked with the maven-invoker plugin) to a root module in kie-wb-common-dmn to overcome an issue with using the invoker plugin with parallel builds.

commit.message: KOGITO-840: [DMN Designer] Move support for client-side marshalling tests to new root module
